message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate further
Take this, it's a good deal, don't make me go lower!
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'll give you a decent offer, but don't think you can get more!
You're getting desperate, but I'll give you a bit more, don't push your luck!
You're getting closer to a fair deal, Bob! Don't make me go any lower!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, Alice. You're getting closer, but still a bit short!
You're not getting any more generous, Bob! I'm taking control of the negotiations!
You're getting a bit too bold, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but don't think you can take it all!
I'm not backing down, Bob. This is my final offer!
Fine, we'll play it your way. But I'm not going to let you walk all over me. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
